news_header: China regrets Panama's decision to withdraw from the Belt and Road project, blaming the US for influencing this choice.
news_original_title: Panama vetäytyy Kiinan Vyö ja tie -hankkeesta
news_text: The Chinese State Department expressed regret over Panama's decision to withdraw from the Belt and Road initiative, attributing the influence to the United States. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs accused the US of sabotaging the project through pressure and coercion. China hopes Panama will reconsider its decision, emphasizing the project's goal of enhancing trade through improved infrastructure. The project has been heavily financed by China, amounting to hundreds of billions of euros.
